name: Fel Celerity
description: Reduces the cooldown of Fel Domination by 45 sec.

name: Resolute Barrier
description: Attacks received that deal at least 5% of your health decrease Unending Resolve's cooldown by 10 seconds. Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.

name: Accrued Vitality
description: Drain Life heals for 0% of the amount drained over 10 sec.

name: Shade of Terror
description: Damage required to break your Fear effects is increased by 0%.

name: Demonic Momentum
description: Demonic Circle increases movement speed by 0% for 5 sec.

name: Corrupting Leer
description: Agony and Unstable Affliction damage has a 3% chance to reduce the cooldown of Summon Darkglare by 5 sec.

name: Rolling Agony
description: Increases the duration of Agony by 4 sec.

name: Focused Malignancy
description: Malefic Rapture deals 30% increased damage to targets suffering from Unstable Affliction.

name: Cold Embrace
description: Increases the effectiveness of Shadow Embrace by 33%.

name: Borne of Blood
description: Hand of Gul'dan has a 15% chance to generate a charge of Demonic Core.

name: Carnivorous Stalkers
description: Your Dreadstalkers' attacks have a 10% chance to trigger an additional Dreadbite.

name: Tyrant's Soul
description: After your Demonic Tyrant expires, gain a Demonic Core and 10% increased damage from your demons for 15 sec.

name: Fel Commando
description: Your Felguard deals 10% more damage and takes 10% less damage.

name: Duplicitous Havoc
description: Havoc transfers 10% more damage.

name: Ashen Remains
description: Chaos Bolt and Incinerate damage on targets with Immolate increased by 10%.

name: Combusting Engine
description: Conflagrate increases your remaining Immolate damage by 15% until Immolate expires or is refreshed.

name: Infernal Brand
description: Your Infernal's melee attacks cause its target to take 15% increased damage from its Immolation, stacking up to 15 times.

name: Soul Tithe
description:
When a target dies under the effect of Scouring Tithe, gain 10% increased damage from your 

<spec>Affliction</spec>
<dynamic>Malefic Rapture - Malefic Rapture</dynamic>

<spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>demons</dynamic>

<spec>Destruction</spec>
<dynamic>Chaos Bolt</dynamic>

 for 10 sec.

name: Prolonged Decimation
description:
<spec>Destruction (Level 10)</spec>
<dynamic>Incinerate - Incinerate</dynamic>

<spec>Affliction</spec><spec>Demonology</spec>
<dynamic>Shadow Bolt</dynamic>

 has a 20% chance to not consume a charge of Decimating Bolt.

name: Catastrophic Origin
description: Impending Catastrophe's damage over time and the inflicted Curse last 50% longer against your primary target.

name: Exhumed Soul
description: Soul Rot damage and radius increased by 20%, but costs 7% more health.
